attributes.action: no to a 39th game in the premier league
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the majority of fans do not want an extra game in the season i find it disgusting that this is to be allowed so easily just so they can have a kickabout for 5 million if it happeneds i predict the death of top flight footie
